name: Balance the beam (itch)
description:
You must help the earthlings to escape their dying planet. Use your awesome balance powers to keep the multidimensional portal open and save as many of Earth's spaceships as possible.

The game was made for the 2015 Alt Ctrl Game Jam by Enric Llagostera. The music is by Visager.

Here you can see a video with a short explanation on how the game works.

The game needs a PC and an Android device connected to the same WiFi network. The Android device must have a gyroscope sensor.
